body.name: HOROW Heated Toilet, Upmarket Compact Toilet, One Piece Smart Toilet with Heating Seat, Small Tankless Toilet with Blackout Flush, Soft Close Cover, 25.6(L) x 15.6(W) x 19.8(H)
features: 【Warm and Comfortable]】 Turn on the seat ring to heat up to drive away the discomfort caused by cold weather.
【Foot flushing】Free your hands, after using the toilet, flush the toilet through the foot induction method. The tornado flushed away the dirt at once.
【Blackout Flushing】 Occasionally there is no fear of power failure. The built-in powerful battery can flush water approximately 2000 times.
【Beautiful Design】The white toilet is like bathing in milk, the slim and compact toilet bowl is suitable for installation in all kinds of beautiful bathrooms.
【Professional Service】 If there is any problem when you receive the product, we promise to provide 30-Day Money Back Guarantee and 12-Month Replacement Warranty.
body.description: HOROW HR-T10SD Heated Seat Toilet Taking it home and enjoy. When you take your rightful place upon the toilet, you can feel the warmth of the heated seat. The seat has seat-warming temperature settings that are especially useful during cold days. As your journey comes to a close, the powerful flushing of the 3D Tornado Flushes and the Bowl Bottom Flushes, aided by the premium glaze whisks away all of the evidence.

The seat has seat-warming temperature settings that are especially useful during cold days. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Overall I'm very happy with this after a couple weeks of use. My contractor said the connection wasn't US standard but he was able to make it work. It's a little loud when it flushes so might be an issue if you have a light sleeper within earshot of it and you go to the bathroom in the middle of the night. But other than that, it's fantastic. Looks amazing, functions perfectly. My main concern was that the sensor would go off and it would flush every time I walked into the room because the door swings open right in front of it. But it has never sensed the door and never failed to sense my foot. Very impressive. It also does a little pre-rinse when you sit down, I assume to wet the bowl and make it less likely that anything will stick. Pretty cool technology and if it means I don't have to clean the toilet as often that will also be a net positive. Maybe this is really like 4.8 stars for me cuz of the sound but I would 100% buy it again and if the location made that a non-issue it would be 5 stars. I live alone for now so can't say how it impacts anyone else but I'm working on that 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customer service!! And a high value value smart toilet.
reviews.reviewText: Great toilet, better customer service. Opted to have this professionally installed (I am not to be trusted with plumbing). Toilet worked very well but I had an issue with the electronic noise (a chime that sounds when you sit on the seat). Customer service swooped in with an upgraded replacement and solved the issue right away. They were so helpful. Apart from this, the overall value for this smart toilet is hard to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Update 1yr after purchase - low flush volume - solution and fix
reviews.reviewText: Works as described very well.Comfortable, quiet, yet solid and sturdy.Water comes from our well and the pressure is adequate for the toilet.I would give 5 stars if there were an installation video I could have referred to, however installation was relatively straight forward. We used the wax ring included with the toilet and have no problems thus far.Update 2/6/24: worked great for almost exactly a year. Abruptly, the flush volumes dropped dramatically to the point it did not release enough water volume to flush at all. I realized there was a debris filter within the elbow connection that came with the toilet. Removed the filter housing and noted debris coating the filter. Cleaned, replaced, and now working as intended.We had a small household filter system which we recently upgraded, and during the upgrade process our pipes must have loosed a slurry of iron/debris which was the culprit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and a huge space saver in a small bathroom
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about my smart toilet - the auto flush, soft seat close, heated seat, heated bidet nozzle with a remote control. The plumbers were able to install it in a small NYC apartment with no problem, and I’m so happy I went with this space-age option. Worth the reasonable price for a smart toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer beware poor design doesn’t flush properly customer service nonexistent.
reviews.reviewText: No stars Toilet looks pretty but that’s about it. Poor design. Why have a pretty toilet that’s soft but doesn’t flush properly! Doesn’t do complete flush . Had 2 plumbers come inspect toilet said installed properly but poor design of toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fabulous toilet for the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this smart toilet and have been thrilled with it!! I put it in my guest bathroom and it looks great. The heated seat is a joy. The company is great to work with!!The knob that covers the temperature gauge of the seat was missing.They offered to send me a new toilet!!I had already installed it. In 48 hours I had the knob. Great customer service, which in this day and age is sometime missing. I highly recommend Horow. This toilet is great for the value as the more expensive brands are in the thousands. after 6 months the seat didnt heat anymore and the customer service team promptly sent me another one. very impressed with their customer service !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service!
reviews.reviewText: My plumbers made a mistake during installation of a Horows tankless toilet…inadvertently they switched a couple inlet pipes.After they left I became suspicious that the way the toilet was flushing did not seem to be what one would expect from a modern upgraded toilet.I sent an inquiry to Horow’s Customer Service and within a couple hours, I received a request to send a video of the toilet flushing.After viewing, they immediately responded with instructions on how to switch the two hoses.Which I did, and it solved my problem!Now it works flawlessly.Great Customer Service, Thank You

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This toilet has a heated seat. It sprays water in to the bowl when you sit down and often it splashed back up on to your booty- not comfortable. The sensor on the bottom of the toilet that can be foot activated is so sensitive that high steam or a little water splash out of the shower sets it off. I emailed the company and you have to take the toilet apart to make this function inoperable. Also the toilet flushes every time you stand up from the seat. Sometimes I don’t want to flush- for example in the middle of the night- and you cannot change this function. I’m happy I have a heated seat, but otherwise disappointed in the toilet and would not purchase again.
